## Description {#details}

Per-SUnit data computed during DFS for various metrics.

A node&#39;s SubtreeID is set to itself when it is visited to indicate that it is the root of a subtree. Later it is set to its parent to indicate an interior node. Finally, it is set to a representative subtree <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> during finalization.

Definition at line 76 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/scheduledfs-h">ScheduleDFS.h</a>.
